page.title: 01Introdution
page.content: This block covers an area to the North of the market town of{Wimborne {Minster.}There are a number of small villages and several farms.Much of the area is covered by a non-statutory Green Belt Policy.This allows the Local Ditrict Council some control over development in the area. Many of the buildings still have traditional thatched roofs and there is an obvious attempt to blend new with old. The use of farmland and the type of farming has changed in recent years.There has been a swing away from mixed farming towards more specialised farming,particularly arable and cattle farming.Some farmers now lease large acreages to their neighbours and maintain only a small proportion of their original landholding.
